description: A luxurious room with a king-size bed and a stunning seafront view. Whether you're in Sylhet for business or leisure, the Fiesta Executive Suite offers a refined and luxurious experience, ensuring that your stay is both productive and relaxing.Elevate your stay with the Fiesta Executive Suite in Sylhet, where luxury meets sophistication. This suite features a private balcony with a stunning sea view, perfect for unwinding after a long day. The room includes a king-size bed and is designed for ultimate comfort and relaxation, with modern amenities such as free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, TV, minibar, coffee maker, iron, hair dryer, and microwave.
